title: Subung fwrel khou onnanwi
lyrics:
"Subung fwrel khou onnanwi
Papni bibankhou bannanwi' -2
'Krushaonw buli jabai (nwng)-2
'Papi fwra basaijabai
Buhuma mitisartbai'-2
Krushaonw..
(A)
'Gaoninw ose mansi fwranw Jisukhou
Homna hwbai - nasoiglibai -2
'Bukrub-sukrub kalambai
Haya haya Krush banhwbai' -2

(B)

"Aikhang-baikhang janangbai dinwi Jisua
Kalvariao - Krushni sayao' -2
'Akhai-athingao gazal dwbai
Suni thopi ganhwbai' -2
